weekend. Ladies and gentlemen, on New Year's Eve, the New
Year in Thailand,
Buddhists in the capital Bangkok celebrated the new year.
New year with a very special ceremony
called revival according to the beliefs of
some Thai Buddhists. This is a ceremony to
wish for a lucky and peaceful New Year
every year at the time of welcoming the Buddhist New Year.
Thailand will experience a
unique ritual at some temples in
Coc State.
After the New Year's Eve ceremony, aspiring Buddhists
will lie in a coffin and
experience a fake death. They will lie in the position holding
flowers and incense.  for a certain period of time
and then wait for the monks to chant and
pray. After the prayers are over, these people
revive and step out of the coffin.
This ritual symbolizes that the resurrected person
has abandoned their long-forgotten sins.
The old year and entering the new year with a
new life, in addition to the meaning of good luck,
this ritual also has the purpose of sending a message
to believers to appreciate
